医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
评论：门诊远程医疗中的抗生素处方和管理同行评审期刊《远程医疗和电子健康》上的一份新报告对门诊远程医疗中抗生素处方和抗生素管理的已发表文献进行了回顾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Review-Antibiotic-prescribing-and-stewardship-in-outPatient-telemedicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Review-Antibiotic-prescribing-and-stewardship-in-outPatient-telemedicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a61660d-8add-4c38-a989-0582ed8bf472 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 12:41:41 -0500 Review: Antibiotic prescribing and stewardship in outpatient telemedicine
研究验证了一流的人工智能驱动的数字病理学结直肠癌诊断工具在《自然通讯》今天发表的一项同行评审研究中，来自法裔美国 techbio Owkin 和法国病理实验室的科学家团队对 MSintuit CRC 进行了盲法验证，MSintuit CRC 是 Owkin 开发的一流的人工智能驱动的数字病理诊断，作为旨在优化结直肠癌诊断和治疗精度的预筛查工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Study-validates-first-in-class-AI-driven-digital-pathology-colorectal-cancer-diagnostic-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Study-validates-first-in-class-AI-driven-digital-pathology-colorectal-cancer-diagnostic-tool.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36a3422b-a773-47f8-b34e-a2aa8988a4b8 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 12:38:08 -0500 Study validates first-in-class AI-driven digital pathology colorectal cancer diagnostic tool
新型疗法为炎症性肠病患者带来新希望溃疡性结肠炎 (UC) 和克罗恩病 (CD) 是影响胃肠道的慢性炎症性肠病 (IBD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Novel-and-emerging-therapies-offer-new-hope-for-病人-with-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Novel-and-emerging-therapies-offer-new-hope-for-病人-with-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19bc3879-aad8-4d51-a250-a90e6ce17651 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 12:29:00 -0500 Novel and emerging therapies offer new hope for patients with inflammatory bowel disease
科学家揭开腹部失败背后的物理原理任何曾经在游泳池里翻滚过的人都知道，最后会发出一声生硬的“啪”的一声、溅起一大片水花和灼热的红色刺痛。大多数人不知道的是为什么。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Scientists-unravel-the-physicals-behind-belly-flops.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Scientists-unravel-the-physicals-behind-belly-flops.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c336f203-89a4-42d0-97ad-b85701223f2e Tue, 07 Nov 2023 12:25:47 -0500 Scientists unravel the physics behind belly flops
慢性肝病发病机制的新见解脂肪肝疾病 (FLD) 已成为全球重大的健康问题，影响数百万人。 FLD 的两种最常见类型是非酒精性脂肪肝病 (NAFLD) 和酒精相关性肝病 (ALD)。 NAFLD 与肥胖、胰岛素抵抗和代谢综合征有关，而 ALD 则由过量饮酒引起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/New-insights-into-the-pathogenesis-of-chronic-liver-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/New-insights-into-the-pathogenesis-of-chronic-liver-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7433b316-ce0a-44f8-a295-cacc74803f32 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 12:18:29 -0500 New insights into the pathogenesis of chronic liver diseases
气候变化可能会加剧温暖季节呼吸道疾病的死亡气候变化引起的全球变暖可能会加剧暖季期间呼吸道疾病住院患者死亡的负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Climate-change-could-exacerbate-respiratory-disease-deaths-during-warm-seasons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Climate-change-could-exacerbate-respiratory-disease-deaths-during-warm-seasons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc85fcdf-6ab1-432d-a848-e3972db1d76d Tue, 07 Nov 2023 12:08:12 -0500 Climate change could exacerbate respiratory disease deaths during warm seasons
研究调查了抑制霍乱弧菌传播的新策略南德克萨斯新发传染病中心 (STCEID) 主任 Karl Klose 以及理学院 Robert J. Kleberg, Jr. 和 Helen C. Kleberg 特聘教授与 UTSA 博士生 Cameron Lloyd '23 共同撰写了一篇研究文章八月毕业并获得博士学位。在克洛泽的指导下获得分子微生物学和免疫学博士学位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Research-investigates-a-novel-strategy-for-inhibiting-the-spread-of-Vibrio-cholerae.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Research-investigates-a-novel-strategy-for-inhibiting-the-spread-of-Vibrio-cholerae.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e47a8a9-4bff-4c4b-b662-732c93de044a Tue, 07 Nov 2023 11:50:19 -0500 Research investigates a novel strategy for inhibiting the spread of Vibrio cholerae
MD 安德森和 Jazz Pharmaceuticals 合作研究 zanidatamab 在表达 HER2 的癌症中的潜力德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和 Jazz Pharmaceuticals plc 今天宣布达成一项为期五年的战略研究合作协议，以评估 Jazz 的研究性 HER2 靶向双特异性抗体 zanidatamab 在多种表达 HER2 的癌症中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/MD-Anderson-and-Jazz-Pharmaceuticals-collaborate-to-investigate-the-potial-of-zanidatamab-in-HER2-expressing-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/MD-Anderson-and-Jazz-Pharmaceuticals-collaborate-to-investigate-the-pottial-of-zanidatamab-in-HER2-expressing-cancers.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7093cc6-51fe-49fa-8883-ad6620f407f4 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 11:28:22 -0500 MD Anderson and Jazz Pharmaceuticals collaborate to investigate the potential of zanidatamab in HER2-expressing cancers
Lario Therapeutics 荣获 CDLK5 论坛颁发的“公司做出贡献奖”，表彰其针对遗传性癫痫精准医疗的独特方法Loulou 基金会于 11 月 6 日至 7 日在伦敦举行的 CDKL5 论坛上颁发了“CDLK5 论坛卓越奖 - 公司在 2023 年临床前有所作为” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Lario-Therapeutics-receives-e2809cCompany-Making-a-Difference-Awarde2809d-from-CDLK5-Forum-recognising-its-unique-approach-to- precision-遗传性癫痫药物.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/Lario-Therapeutics-receives-e2809cCompany-Making-a-Difference-Awarde2809d-from-CDLK5-Forum-recognising-its-unique-approach-to- precision-遗传性癫痫药物.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41b7740c-25d0-425c-98a2-abe4f2062191 Tue, 07 Nov 2023 08:52:00 -0500 Lario Therapeutics receives “Company Making a Difference Award” from CDLK5 Forum, recognising its unique approach to precision medicine for genetic epilepsies
遗传变异在多大程度上可以解释儿童屏幕时间与精神问题之间的关联？研究人员通过一项针对青春期前儿童的大型人群队列研究，调查了遗传学在屏幕时间与精神问题之间表型关联中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/To-what-extent-can-genic-variations-explain-the-associations- Between-screen-time-and-psychiatric-problems-in-children。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231107/To-what-extent-can-genic-variations-explain-the-associations- Between-screen-time-and-psychiatric-problems-in-children。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7aa1d33-2538-4c0e-b1ff-7055f76cbe6c Tue, 07 Nov 2023 06:52:00 -0500 To what extent can genetic variations explain the associations between screen time and psychiatric problems in children?
